properties.name: config.authorization
properties.description: 访问控制接口所需要的授权.

properties.name: config.file-cache-dir
properties.description: 本地缓存文件存储的目录.

properties.name: config.record-expiry-sec
properties.description: 允许失效记录最大的存活时间.

properties.name: config.temp-file-expiry-sec
properties.description: 允许临时文件最大的存活时间.

properties.name: config.task-concurrent-max-count
properties.description: 允许并发的最大任务数(主动模式).

properties.name: config.timers
properties.description: 定时器配置，首次时间格式为yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

properties.name: config.manager-hosts
properties.description: 管理服务器配置，多个host使用“,”或“;”进行分隔.
